about_the_game:
'Noad: The Priest' is a 2D action adventure game that tells the story of a priest.

The protagonist, who is the only priest who can turn 'Adven' into 'light',
conducts an investigation himself when Adven flows out of the gate that suddenly appears.

This is the story of the protagonist priest who learns the relationship between
'Adven', an unknown black material that causes pain, and 'light', the opposite concept.

Face the truth about what Adven is, why the gate came about,
and how the protagonist priest turns Adven into a light!




·We have some reactive enemies ready. Depending on what conditions the enemies are attacked in, their next behavior may change. You can face reactive enemies to figure out the rules of conduct and induce them to fight in the style you want.

·Weapons, prayers, accessory, gem... You can be strong in many ways. Various combinations of accessory and gem allow you to get a variety of blessings that have beneficial effects. You can combine them to create your own combat style to receive the blessings you want.

·Find new idea and items and break new paths.

·Made from hand drawn pixel animation (not procedurally generated).
